message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product's value, but my budget allows me to pay up to $1000000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Given my budget, I am able to consider $950000 as a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
